name: Find the words
description:
Find the words is a game where you learn the story of somebody, who have gone through something that tear his life. 

Sometimes, stories are forgot to remove the suffering out of you.

Find out the price that the main character paid to oblivion his past...

Repair the disorder and find the truth...

------

We made this game on Global Game Jam 2020 at Abiding Bridge & ISEN Lille Game Jam Site.  We're proud to share with you our work full of kindness and love.

We hope, that you'll have a great time playing our game, and don't hesitate to share with us what you think about it ! 

ヽ(´▽`)/   <( Have Fun)

-----
Information that may help you during the game :
- You can close the main text section in right top of the screen.  (Red Cross)
- At some point during the game, you can "Point and Click" on some item again.
- If you struggle to find where you can click, be aware, there might be something that can help you.... : )
